message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XRV_SERVICE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_FROM_DATE_OF_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: Service Date, %1d, must be on or after the Service From date, %2d, of roster line item.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XRV_SERVICE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_TO_DATE_OF_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: Service Date, %1d ,must be on or before the Service To date, %2d ,of roster line item.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_FV_EXPECTED_UNITS_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: Expected Units must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_FV_UNITS_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: Units Attended must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_FV_UNITS_NOT_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: Units Not Attended must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_UNITS_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_ENTERED_EITHER_PRESENT_OR_PARTIALLY_PRESENT
message.locale: Units Attended must be entered if attendance is entered as either 'Present' or 'Partially Present'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_UNITS_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_ZERO_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_ENTERED_ABSENT
message.locale: Units attended must be zero if the attendance is entered 'Absent'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_UNITS_NOT_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_ZERO_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_PRESENT
message.locale: Units Not Attended must be zero if attendance is entered 'Present'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_ABSENCE_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_ENTERED_EITHER_ABSENT_OR_PARTIALLY_PRESENT
message.locale: The Absence Reason must be entered if the Attendance is entered as either 'Absent' or 'Partially Present'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_ABSENCE_REASON_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_PRESENT
message.locale: The Absence Reason must not be entered if the type of participation entered is 'Present'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_PROGRESS_MUST_BE_SELECTED_IF_PROGRESS_REASON_HAS_BEEN_ENTERED
message.locale: Progress must be selected if progress reason has been entered.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_PROGRESS_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_PROGRESS_IS_SELECTED
message.locale: Progress Reason must be entered if Progress is selected.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_FV_PROGRESS_REASON_ENTERED_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This daily attendance has already been canceled.
This daily attendance has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_FV_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The comments text has exceeded its maximum capacity.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_TIME_PARTICIPATED_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_TYPE_IS_ABSENT
message.locale: Time Participated must not be entered if attendance type is 'Absent'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_TIME_ABSENT_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_TYPE_IS_PRESENT
message.locale: Time Absent must not be entered if attendance type is 'Present'.
